channel.title: Background for client, banner
channel.description:
Hey, who is a guy, girl who has photoshop and can make me a RSPS background? Info:
Server name: WaleedScape: Text: Why so serious...? Images requested: some pking pics would be appreciated, anyone who makes me a banner can become a co on my server
NOTE: please tell me if this is in the wrong section, im new here, so :confused:

item.title: Background for client, banner
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

There are several topics which provide free photoshopping of banners/backgrounds etc.

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:5, topic:338436”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=434825.msg3193132#msg3193132 date=1272481252]
I know this is maybe WAY to epic for your client…but I worked real hard on it sooo
[ IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/211jqcg.png[/img]
[/quote]

Nice troll.[/quote]
Thing is, it does meet all criteria provided.
The above is the computer science way of doing things; if you’re not told to do something why do it. (designers should be responsible for that shit)

Read full topic
